name: goanywhere
label: GoAnywhere
description: GoAnywhere MFT is a secure file transfer solution that organizations use to exchange their data safely. The solution helps organizations automate their data transfers, centralize file transfer activity, monitor file transfers and user access. This connector facilitates automated operation related to File Transfer Summary, Active Sessions Details, and Completed Jobs Summary.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the GoAnywhere server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Specify the username to access the GoAnywhere server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: username

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Specify the password to access the GoAnywhere server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: password

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified.
By default, this option is set to True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get File Transfer Summary
operations.description: Retrieves the file transfers and their summary details for a specified service from GoAnywhere based on the GoAnywhere module, date range, and grouping criteria specified.

parameters.title: Module
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the GoAnywhere modules to include in the file transfer statistics from the following available options: AS2, FTP, FTPS, SFTP, etc.
parameters.name: module
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the GoAnywhere modules to include in the file transfer statistics from the following available options: AS2, FTP, FTPS, SFTP, etc.

parameters.title: Date Range
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the date range of file transfers from the following available options: Today, Yesterday, Last 7 Days, Last 30 Days, etc.
parameters.name: date_range
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the date range of file transfers from the following available options: Today, Yesterday, Last 7 Days, Last 30 Days, etc. By default, this option is set as Today.

parameters.title: Group By
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the criteria to group the statistics from the following available options: Hour, Day Of Week, Day Of Month, or Month.
parameters.name: group_by
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the criteria to group the statistics from the following available options: Hour, Day Of Week, Day Of Month, or Month. By default, this option is set as Hour.

operations.title: Get Active Sessions Details
operations.description: Retrieves details for each active session from GoAnywhere based on the session type you have specified.

parameters.title: Services
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the GoAnywhere services returned, from the following available options: HTTPS Sessions, FTP Sessions, FTPS Sessions, SFTP Sessions, etc.
parameters.name: services
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the GoAnywhere services returned, from the following available options: HTTPS Sessions, FTP Sessions, FTPS Sessions, SFTP Sessions, etc.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: max_rows
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the maximum count of records that you want this operation to fetch from GoAnywhere. By default, this option is set as 5.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum count of records that you want this operation to fetch from GoAnywhere.

operations.title: Get Completed Jobs Summary
operations.description: Retrieves the count of completed jobs from GoAnywhere based on the date range, grouping criteria, and job status that you have specified.

parameters.title: Date Range
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the date range of job statistics from the following available options: Today, Yesterday, Last 7 Days, Last 30 Days, etc.
parameters.name: date_range
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the date range of job statistics from the following available options: Today, Yesterday, Last 7 Days, Last 30 Days, etc. By default, this option is set as Today.

parameters.title: Group By
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the criteria to group the statistics from the following available options: Hour, Day Of Week, Day Of Month, or Month. By default, this option is set as Hour.
parameters.name: group_by
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the criteria to group the statistics from the following available options: Hour, Day Of Week, Day Of Month, or Month. By default, this option is set as Hour.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the criteria to filter the results by job status from the following available options: Success, Failed, or Canceled.
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the criteria to filter the results by job status from the following available options: Success, Failed, or Canceled.
